question:
WEALTHY NATIONS SHOULD ASSIST POORER COUNTRIES WITH HUMANITARIAN RELIEF DURING NATURAL DISASTERS.
DO YOU AGREE OR DISAGREE?
text: IT IS ARGUED THAT RICH COUNTRIES SHOULD HELP UNWEALTHY NATIONS WITH HUMANITARIAN RELIEF DURING NATURAL CALAMITIES.THIS ESSAY AGREES WITH THIS STATEMENT BECAUSE THEY HAVE A MORAL OBLIGATION TO DO SO AND THEY CAN AFFORD TO DO IT.

THE RICH STATES HAVE  THE MORAL RESPONSIBILITY DURING THESE UNFORTUNATE EVENTS AND ACCIDENTS TO LEND THEIR HANDS TO THESE UNDERPRIVILEGED NATIONS.IT IS CONSIDERED AS THE RIGHT THING TO HELP  THOSE WHO ARE IN NEED ACROSS THE WORLD OF HUMANITY.THESE GROUPS CAN REALLY MAKE THESE CALLS DURING THOSE DIFFICULT TIMES AND MAKE AN IMPACT ON THOSE LIVES.THE FOUNDATION OF INTERNATIONAL ORGANISATIONS LIKE THE UNITED NATIONS,THE RED CROSS, AND THE WORLD HEALTH ORGANISATION ARE INTENDED TO  MANAGE THAT SITUATION EFFECTIVELY WITH MULTIPLE-LEVEL COORDINATION FOR A BETTER WORLD.

THE WEALTHIER COUNTRIES  HAVE ENOUGH FINANCIAL RESOURCES , WHICH THEY CAN AFFORD TO DONATE TO THOSE NEEDY NATIONS.THEY HAVE ENOUGH LEFT IN THEIR NATIONAL TREASURES FOR THE DECADES TO COME AND THE LATEST KNOWLEDGE ABOUT EFFECTIVE WAYS OF DISASTER MANAGEMENT FINANCIALLY AS WELL AS MEDICALLY.THIS CAN BE DONE BY WRITING OFF THE LOANS THEY HAVE GIVEN OR OFFERING MORE MONEY WITH LESS INTEREST FOR A LONGER  PERIOD OF TIME .ALSO BY EXTENDING TECHNOLOGICAL AND MEDICAL RESOURCES WHICH THEY HAVE IN PLENTY.

THE DEVELOPED WORLD MUST HELP THE UNDER-DEVELOPED AS WELL AS DEVELOPING NATIONS DURING AN UNFORTUNATE EVENT, AS THEY ARE THE LEADERS OF THE MANKIND WHICH MAKES IT THEIR MORAL RESPONSIBILITY AND THEY ARE IN A MORE ADVANCED STATE OF RICHNESS AND HAVE BETTER RESOURCES TO DO SO.
